value: ARE YOU SURE YOU WANT TO START A NEW GAME? *YOUR PROGRESS WILL BE RESET!

[A] : Walk to Left
[D]: Walk to Right
[Space]: Jump or Use
[Tab]: Inventory
[ESC]: Menu

10 DAYS AFTER THE CRASH:

Jack wakes up suddenly one night.
When he sticks his head out of the window, he notices something incomprehensible standing on the street.
Jack, decides to go down from the apartment and examine the thing from closely.

Jack encountered a creature on the street.
Dozens of corpses lie on the ground with their dried blood.
A fear fills him.
He tries to call on his phone but cannot reach anyone.
The best he can do is try to reach his car and check for the safety of his family in their farm house.

Creatures are everywhere. The parking lot is split in half.
A cocoon inside the crevice. A giant creature inside. Jack is surprised at what happened.
He somehow overcomes the creature and makes his way back to the parking lot through the sewers to his car.
Jack is curious about his family. He gets on the highway and hits the gas.

Jack reaches the village where his family lives outside the city.
His family lives in one of the fields nearby.
The roads are made of dirt. There are cold puddles on the ground.
He continues on his way, unaware of what he will encounter.

Jack somehow made it to his family's house.
Creature types are becoming more and more diverse.
Attacking from the ground was not enough, now they are attacking from the air.
The cold water on the ground prevented the vehicle from heating.
Jack must make sure of his family's safety as soon as possible.

Jack's family was not at home.
This is not a good sign. Were the scary paintings and ghosts found in the house related to Jack's family?
Then, just at that moment, a Flyer takes Jack and leaves him in the forest. It's a good thing he took the flashlight he found on the floor at home with him. He took the flashlight out of his pocket and turned it on.

This flashlight has extraordinary power against these creatures.
The forest gets weirder as we progress.
The flowered land was very beautiful at first, but as we progressed, we saw that the flowers began to turn black and dark. Not to mention the gravestones.

Jack encountered a giant fiery worm in the forest.
If these spread further around the world, very bad things could happen.
Jack begins to follow the path. But the search does not end.
He searches for hope, salvation...

While Jack is walking on the road, a sign catches his eye.
He sees the airport logo on the sign. It occurs to him that people might have taken refuge here.
This sign gives him the hope he is looking for.
While walking on the road, he sees wrecked cars and corpses on the ground.
Creatures have literally taken over everywhere.

Arriving at the airport, Jack is surprised by the first thing he encounters.
This creature is doing something that even humanity cannot do.
The lightning he sends down from the sky does not harm him, and he is not affected by fire.
Moreover, when his body is damaged, he raises himself to the sky.
Is this invasive species an intelligent species?

Episode 1: Awakening
Jack notices a dead body in the street and moves towards it.

Episode 2: Parking Lot
Jack tries to call everyone on the phone, but no one answers. The lights of the buildings are on, but they are all empty. It was as if the ground opened up and everyone fell in. Fear surrounds him.

Episode 3: Travel
Jack begins to think that he is completely alone and puts the tape he took from the window sill into the car radio. He lights a cigarette and continues on his way. Despair is the thing he hates the most.

Episode 4: Farm House
Jack has moved away from the dreary city atmosphere. When he checks the gas gauge, he notices that the bar is at the orange area. And he sees a difficult terrain ahead.

Episode 5: My Fears
Jack thinks about his family and home. He has no idea what's going on in the world. The creatures have made it this far.

Episode 6: Desolate Forest
Jack was captured by a flying creature and left in the forest. He needs to find his way as soon as possible.

Episode 7: Graveyard
The confusing forest like its endless. Jack has now reached an even more chilling place. There are often gravestones around.

Episode 8: The Way
Even though Jack was afraid, what he encountered was incredible. But where is humanity? What happened to everyone?

Episode 9: Airport
Jack hopes that all the survivors are gathered here. He continues to search for a trace of humanity.

Episode 10: Revenge
Jack captured a bomber he found. He starts to take off the plane with the desire to return to the city and get rid of the things he hates. There will be a massacre.

I can't remember..
Where I was before..
What I was doing.
 It's like someone else..
Inside my body..
That i feel.
I must focus.
I have to reach my family.
They remind me some emotions..
What i haven't.
I see something in them..
Something I don't have.

Jack has found no evidence that humanity still exists.


But he did not lose hope.


He will continue to fight against this invasive species until the end.


Bombing the city he lives in with the bomber plane he found makes him on his in tears.








THE END.




THANK YOU FOR PLAYING.








Project Management,


Level Design,


Scripts,


Controls,


UI,


Effects,


Drawings,


Graphic,


Story,


Audio Placement and


Music Placement: Ali SARIASLAN.
I need to reach my vehicle.
No way, the parking lot is split in half!
I can't believe what I saw.
These flying things seem sensitive to light.
I better not go any further before I kill these creatures!
I can almost see the house.
She left me in the forest.
These creatures are faster when i walk. If I time it well, I can avoid them.
So where did I end up?
I'm going in the wrong direction.
The flowers have faded in this area.
Everywhere is burning. What is going on here?
I can see the road. Its close!
This gun will come in handy, I'm very lucky.
It looks like an airport sign.
I wonder how much longer will I walk?
I'm getting close to the airport.
Congratulations! You have successfully completed the arena.
